resources.string:
[zebedee port to android]

version 0.2
zebedee (jzbd) ported to Android platform by idleloop: 
 www.angelfire.com/ego2/idleloop
 idleloop@yahoo.com

Original program at: 
 www.winton.org.uk/zebedee
Zebedee's java version (jzbd) at: 
 sourceforge.net/projects/zebedee
